lead_paragraph: PRESENT--Daniel H.,M.D. For 50 years we had the privilege and joy and warmth of Dan's friendship together with Jane at his side. He was our ally, comforter, advisor and also gave us his most superb and caring medical expertise. For 25 years we spent every summer together in the Berkshires at Lakecrest which gave him much tranquility and a pause from the care of his patients and research. We will always cherish these 50 years of his friendship. May G-d comfort Jane, Tracy, Stephanie, Douglas, his sister Judy and their families. May his name be forever a blessing. Susan and Bob Schwartz and Family 1/3
